pkgmetadata.longdescription: PARAFAC Analysis of Fluorescence Excitation-Emission Matrices // Perform parallel factor analysis (PARAFAC: Harshman, 2005) doi:10.1121/1.1977523) on fluorescence excitation-emission matrices (FEEMs): handle scattering signal (Bahram, 2007) doi:10.1002/cem.978 and inner filter effect (Kothawala, 2013) doi:10.4319/lom.2013.11.616, scale the dataset, fit the model; perform split-half validation (DeSarbo, 1984) https://papers.ssrn.com/abstract=2783446 or jack-knifing (Riu, 2003) doi:10.1016/S0169-7439(02)00090-4. The package has a low dependency footprint (only two direct dependencies not in core or recommended; four total non-core/recommended dependencies) and has been tested on a wide range of R versions (including R as old as 3.3.3 from Debian Stretch).
